TutorialScript.TutorialStep: It's Wednesday, and the usual gaggle of desperate boys is waiting outside the corner store for a glimpse at Monica.
Or at least that's what she imagines they're doing. I mean, why else would they be there? Obviously it's to bask in her popularity.

Most interesting is that exchange student, Gunter, from one of those trendy countries like Germany or Paris or the Castro or whatever. Not her usual type, but maybe someone edgy could make the week more interesting...

And football star Buzz? Ugh. He and Monica have already dated and broken up more times than she can remember. He's dating Naomi right now, anyway, isn't he? What could *he* be lurking around here for?
Simon must be really desperate for a date if he thinks he has a shot with Monica. On the other hand... maybe there's some way she could use this situation to her advantage.
Or maybe it's time to finally tell all these fools what she really thinks of them. It's up to Monica.
